data.Title: Google Rolls Out August 2024 Core Update
data.Description: Google's August 2024 core update targets low-value SEO content, promoting quality websites. Full rollout expected within a month.

data.Title: Google Search Expands AI Overviews Globally
data.Description: Google Search expands AI overviews to six countries, adds a save function, and simplifies language while testing in-text links for web content.

data.Title: FTC Bans Fake Reviews
data.Description: "The new rules prohibit the selling of fake and AI-generated reviews and testimonials in several forms." And: "The formal ban also comes with stiff penalties for violators of the new rules. Fines could reach as high as $50,000 per violation."

data.Title: Google Search Ranking Bug Impacting Large Number of Search Results
data.Description: Article reporting on a confirmed Google Search ranking bug affecting a large number of search results, unrelated to the core update.

data.Title: LinkedIn Improves Semantic Search Capacity
data.Description: "LinkedIn measures the performance of these updated queries based on topic matching and dwell time" -> LinkedIn Outlines Improved Semantic Search Capacity "The overview explains how LinkedIn has now built in more elements to understand and respond to search queries, both in…
